head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BIDEAUX, RENE L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BIDEAUX, RENE L.

block.p: BIDEAUX-Rene L. On May 10, 2000, of Las Vegas, NV formerly of Valley Stream, NY. Beloved husband of the late Marie. Loving father of Kathy & Artie Berberich, Bob & Katherine, Jean & Bob Mead, and Mary Bideaux. Devoted companion of Mary Alice. Cherished Poppy of Denise, Diane, Douglas, Timothy and Kelsey. Former employee of The New York Times for over 46 years. Reposing at James Funeral Home, Inc., 540 Broadway, Massapequa, NY. Visiting hours Sunday and Monday 2-4:30 and 7-9:30 PM. Leaving Funeral Home at 10 AM Tuesday for Calverton National Cemetery.
